review: I had hoped for more TV shows free with Prime membership.  Silly to pay $80 a month to a cable company so as to be able to get 3 or 4 channels with good writing and acting.  But so often on Prime, when I'm delighted to find a show I'd liked with cable, I see the charge  for it.  One could spend $100's that way
